name: "\U0001F9F0 Tool Request"
about: Suggest adding a tool/package to the VM
title: "[kind/tool-request] <Tool Name Here>"
labels: kind/tool-request, tool/triaged
assignees: ''

---

Please read [docs/TOOLING_POLICY.md](https://github.com/tracelabs/tlosint-vm/blob/main/docs/TOOLING_POLICY.md) for evaluation criteria before submitting.

**Tool Name & Version**
e.g., htop 3.2

**Why should this be included? What OSINT category does this tool fall under?**
Brief justification (common usage, productivity, SOCMINT, HUMINT, etc.)

**Installation source**
Package manager name, URL, or instructions.

**Dependencies / Conflicts**
Anything else it requires or conflicts with?

**Additional context**
Screenshots, use cases, etc.
